define TIME_STOP 500
define CELL_RADIUS 20

dim 3

boundaries x 0 40
boundaries y 0 40
boundaries z 0 40

frame_thickness 0

time_start 0
time_stop TIME_STOP
time_step 0.005

species A B C D E

difc A(solution) 0.75
difc B(solution) 1.0
difc C(solution) 0.8
difc D(solution) 1.1
difc E(solution) 1.3

display_size A(solution) 2
display_size B(solution) 3
display_size C(solution) 2
display_size D(solution) 3
display_size E(solution) 4

reaction rxn1 A + B -> C 0.3

reaction rxn2 C + D -> A 0.2

reaction rxn3 A + D -> B + C 0.3
binding_radius rxn3 1.2
product_placement rxn3 bounce -2

reaction rxn4 A + C -> E 1.3

start_surface sphere_surface
    action both all reflect
    polygon both face
    panel sphere 0 0 0 CELL_RADIUS CELL_RADIUS CELL_RADIUS
end_surface

start_compartment cell
    surface sphere_surface
    point 0 0 0
end_compartment

# mol 10 A(solution) 0-10 0-10 0-10 
# mol 5 B(solution) 0-10 0-10 0-10 
# mol 10 C(solution) 0-10 0-10 0-10 
# mol 5 D(solution) 0-10 0-10 0-10 
compartment_mol 10 A cell
compartment_mol 10 B cell 
compartment_mol 10 C cell
compartment_mol 10 D cell 
compartment_mol 5 E cell

output_files test_out.txt
cmd i 0 TIME_STOP 1 executiontime test_out.txt
cmd i 0 TIME_STOP 1 listmols test_out.txt

end_file
